title: Topic 001 Question 024
body: You have an Azure Stack Hub integrated system that has several Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) tenants onboarded for various departments at your company. Each department uses a specific tag for every resource it creates.
You need to generate a report to help the finance department perform a chargeback to each department.
Which three actions should you perform in sequence? To answer, move the appropriate actions from the list of actions to the answer area and arrange them in the correct order.
